languages.text: Мемуары Вольного Торговца, вышедшие из-под пера сервочерепов, стали литературной вехой Коронуса. По иронии судьбы в многократно переписанную для распространения автобиографию вкралось такое количество искажений и переосмыслений, что спустя пару веков в копиях очерков не осталось ни капли правды. Подлинные мемуары стали предметом спекуляции среди предприимчивых коллекционеров, и на подпольных аукционах порой проводятся секретные торги, где знать готова отдать миры и пустотные корабли за право обладать столь невероятной ценностью.

The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned autobiography became a landmark of literature in the Expanse. In an ironic twist, the numerous manual copies made during the memoir's distribution littered it with so many distortions and reinterpretations that, centuries later, no widely available version of the text contained even a single word of truth. The original publication has become an object of speculative trade among enterprising collectors, and secret underground auctions are sometimes held, in which noble buyers are prepared to part with entire worlds and voidships just for the chance to possess a manuscript of such incredible value.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned memoir became a landmark event in Koronus literature. In an ironic twist, the numerous manual copies made during the distribution of the autobiography littered it with so many distortions and reinterpretations that centuries later, no widely available version of the text contained a single word of truth. The original memoir has become the object of speculative trade among enterprising collectors, and underground auctions are sometimes held in secret where noble buyers are prepared to part with worlds and voidships so they could possess a manuscript of such incredible value.

languages.text: Die vom Servoschädel {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} aufgezeichnete Autobiografie wurde ein literarischer Meilenstein in der Ausdehnung. Es mutet fast ironisch an, dass die zahlreichen bei der Vervielfältigung angefertigten, handgefertigten Kopien so viele Verzerrungen und Umdeutungen erhielten, dass einige Jahrhunderte später keine einzige weithin erhältliche Version des Textes auch nur ein einziges wahres Wort aufwies. Die ursprüngliche Veröffentlichung ist unter engagierten Sammlern mittlerweile ein gesuchtes Gut, und manchmal gibt es geheime Auktionen, bei denen adlige Käufer bereit sind, sich von ganzen Welten und Raumschiffen zu trennen, nur um dieses unglaublich wertvolle Manuskript in Händen zu halten.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned autobiography became a landmark of literature in the Expanse. languages.text: L'autobiographie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, rédigée par un servocrâne, devint une référence littéraire dans toutes les Étendues. Par une étrange ironie du sort, ces mémoires furent l'objet de tant de copies manuelles que le texte en fut très largement modifié et réinterprété, si bien qu'aujourd'hui, bien des siècles plus tard, aucune version en circulation ne contient ne serait-ce qu'une once de vérité. La version d'origine est devenue un tel objet de spéculation pour les collectionneurs que, lors de ventes aux enchères clandestines, certains acheteurs n'hésitent pas à mettre des mondes entiers, voire des vaisseaux sur le tapis pour avoir la chance de posséder un manuscrit d'une telle valeur.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned autobiography became a landmark of literature in the Expanse. In an ironic twist, the numerous manual copies made during the memoir's distribution littered it with so many distortions and reinterpretations that, centuries later, no widely available version of the text contained even a single word of truth. The original publication has become an object of speculative trade among enterprising collectors, and secret underground auctions are sometimes held, in which noble buyers are prepared to part with entire worlds and voidships just for the chance to possess a manuscript of such incredible value.

languages.text: 行商浪人通过伺服头骨写成的自传，后来成为了科罗努斯扩区文学史上的里程碑。讽刺的是，回忆录畅销期间，许多人为这份回忆录抄写了许多手抄本，对其中大量内容进行了扭曲与重新诠释。几个世纪之后，那些广为流传的版本之中，几乎没有任何内容是没被篡改过的。至于这本自传最初的印刷版，则成为了许多野心勃勃收藏家竞相角逐的藏品。收藏家的圈子里偶尔会举行秘密的地下拍卖会，许多位高权重的买家愿意开出几艘虚空舰乃至几个世界的高价，只为了能获得一份价值连城的手稿。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned autobiography became a landmark of literature in the Expanse. In an ironic twist, the numerous manual copies made during the memoir's distribution littered it with so many distortions and reinterpretations that, centuries later, no widely available version of the text contained even a single word of truth. The original publication has become an object of speculative trade among enterprising collectors, and secret underground auctions are sometimes held, in which noble buyers are prepared to part with entire worlds and voidships just for the chance to possess a manuscript of such incredible value.

行商浪人通过伺服头骨写成的自传，后来成为了科罗努斯扩区文学史上的里程碑。讽刺的是，回忆录畅销期间，许多人为这份回忆录抄写了许多手抄本，对其中大量内容进行了扭曲与重新诠释。几个世纪之后，那些广为流传的版本之中，几乎没有任何内容是没被篡改过的。至于这本自传最初的印刷版，则成为了许多野心勃勃收藏家竞相角逐的藏品。收藏家的圈子里偶尔会举行秘密的地下拍卖会，许多位高权重的买家愿意开出几艘虚空舰乃至几个世界的高价，只为了能获得一份价值连城的手稿。

languages.text: La autobiografía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, escrita por su servocráneo, marcó un hito literario en la Extensión. Irónicamente, las numerosas copias hechas a mano durante la distribución de las memorias distorsionaron y reinterpretaron tanto el texto que, siglos más tarde, ninguna de las versiones comunes del libro contenía ni una sola palabra verdadera. La publicación original se ha convertido en un artículo de comercio especulativo entre los coleccionistas, y en ocasiones se celebran subastas secretas en las que los nobles están dispuestos a intercambiar naves y mundos enteros con tal de hacerse con uno de los valiosísimos manuscritos.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned autobiography became a landmark of literature in the Expanse. In an ironic twist, the numerous manual copies made during the memoir's distribution littered it with so many distortions and reinterpretations that, centuries later, no widely available version of the text contained even a single word of truth. The original publication has become an object of speculative trade among enterprising collectors, and secret underground auctions are sometimes held, in which noble buyers are prepared to part with entire worlds and voidships just for the chance to possess a manuscript of such incredible value.

traits.locale_text: La autobiografía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, escrita por su servocráneo, marcó un hito literario en la Extensión. Irónicamente, las numerosas copias hechas a mano durante la distribución de las memorias distorsionaron y reinterpretaron tanto el texto que, siglos más tarde, ninguna de las versiones comunes del libro contenía ni una sola palabra verdadera. La publicación original se ha convertido en un artículo de comercio especulativo entre los coleccionistas, y en ocasiones se celebran subastas secretas en las que los nobles están dispuestos a intercambiar naves y mundos enteros con tal de hacerse con uno de los valiosísimos manuscritos.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーのサーヴォスカルが執筆した自叙伝は、エクスパンスにおける文学の金字塔となった。しかし皮肉なことに、その回想録の配布時に作られた多数の手作業による写本には歪曲や再解釈が多く含まれており、数世紀後に広く流通している版の中には一語も真実が含まれていなかった。オリジナルの出版物は新進的な収集家の間で推測的な取引の対象となり、秘密の地下オークションが時折開催されることもある。そこでは貴族の買い手が、そうした信じがたい価値を持つ写本を手に入れるために、惑星やヴォイドシップを丸ごと差し出す覚悟をしていた。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned autobiography became a landmark of literature in the Expanse. In an ironic twist, the numerous manual copies made during the memoir's distribution littered it with so many distortions and reinterpretations that, centuries later, no widely available version of the text contained even a single word of truth. The original publication has become an object of speculative trade among enterprising collectors, and secret underground auctions are sometimes held, in which noble buyers are prepared to part with entire worlds and voidships just for the chance to possess a manuscript of such incredible value.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in hizmeletiyle kaleme alınan otobiyografisi, Enginlik edebiyatında bir dönüm noktası oldu. İroniktir ki anıların dağıtımı sırasında el yazması sayısız kopya yüzünden ana metin o kadar çarpıtıldı ve yeniden yorumlandı ki yüzyıllar sonra, metnin yaygın bulunan hiçbir versiyonunda tek bir doğru kelime bile kalmamıştı. Asıl yayın, müteşebbis koleksiyoncular arasında değeri tahmine dayalı bir ticaret nesnesi hâline geldi ve zaman zaman gizli yeraltı müzayedeleri düzenlendi. Bu müzayedelerde soylu alıcılar, böylesine inanılmaz değerli bir el yazmasını edinmek şansına sahip olmak için tüm dünyaları ve uçsuz gemileri gözden çıkarmaya hazırdı.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servo-skull-penned autobiography became a landmark of literature in the Expanse. In an ironic twist, the numerous manual copies made during the memoir's distribution littered it with so many distortions and reinterpretations that, centuries later, no widely available version of the text contained even a single word of truth. The original publication has become an object of speculative trade among enterprising collectors, and secret underground auctions are sometimes held, in which noble buyers are prepared to part with entire worlds and voidships just for the chance to possess a manuscript of such incredible value.
